skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
Sometimes it's possible to bend time.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: Only few casters are able to stabilize winds of magic.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +2
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +4
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Their armour and mounts drip with sacred water, protecting the Lost Sons from mundane weaponry.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The Lost Sons are sent to battle under only the most dire of circumstances. Their fury against the despoilers of Bretonnia is limitless.
By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison

skillTree.localised_description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.localised_description: Never to be broken or dishonoured - never to succumb to the foe.
The Lost Sons were taken from birth by the Fay Enchantress, and schooled in the arcane as well as the martial arts.
The smiths have already completed their order, the workers are in position and the masons are ready to begin.

effects.description:
Construction time: -10% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +5%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +10%
	(own characters in region)

Magic item drop chance: +20%
	(own characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We all must fight, no matter our station.
I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!
We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Knight's skill, prowess, and finesse with blade and lance are beyond compare; his bravery, horsemanship, and chivalry above all others.
Most loyal of Companions, this Knight fights always at the side of his Liege.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Knight units
	(all units in army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base
target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In the glory of the charge is this Knight most alive, ever in the forefront of battle.
A master of the feint and riposte, this Knight's skill at turning an enemy's strength against them is legendary.
So great is this Knight's skill with a lance that none can unhorse them.
Haughty, proud, and skilful, this Knight never takes a backward step in the face of adversity.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Steeled by this Knight's bravery, those around them fight with the courage of the Breton himself.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: With a heart of stone and resolute temper this Knight stands unbowed, spilling the foe's blood with each sweep and thrust.
Unbending even in the face of the greatest beasts, this Knight mounts their heads on the wall of his feasting chamber.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A hermit-Knight, this one nevertheless always returns to fight for his beloved king.
This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.
No matter the odds, this Knight takes to the field utterly undaunted by the numberless hordes of his enemies.

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: -10% for Knights of the Realm units
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +5 for Knight of the Realm units
	(all units in army)

Melee defence: +5 for Knights of the Realm units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A champion of the common man, Martrud was beloved by those he protected. Wherever he fought, the peasants doubled their efforts and would fight to the death rather than dishonor their lord.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for non-Knight units
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +5 for Peasant units
	(all units in army)

Upkeep: -10% for non-Knight units
	(all units in army)
